parameters.name: Thickness
parameters.description: Wall thickness of the sheet metal feature

parameters.name: ThickenDir
parameters.description: Direction to thicken the sheet metal

parameters.name: Radius
parameters.description: Global bend radius to insert at the corners

parameters.name: ExtrudeDist1
parameters.description: Distance of the sheet metal extrusion for the Direction 1

parameters.name: ExtrudeDist2
parameters.description: Distance of the sheet metal extrusion for the Direction 2

parameters.name: FlipExtruDir
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the extrude, false to not

parameters.name: EndCondition1
parameters.description: End condition for first extrude distance

parameters.name: EndCondition2
parameters.description: End condition for second extrude distance

parameters.name: DirToUse
parameters.description: End condition type as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: PCBA
parameters.description: Pointer to the custom bend allowance object

parameters.name: UseDefaultRelief
parameters.description: True to use the default relief, false to not

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Relief type as defined in swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e

parameters.name: ReliefWidth
parameters.description: Width of the relief

parameters.name: ReliefDepth
parameters.description: Depth of the relief

parameters.name: ReliefRatio
parameters.description: Value for the relief ratio

parameters.name: UseReliefRatio
parameters.description: True to use the relief ratio, false to not
